metadata.purpose: Document best isomorphisms from Session 5 after adding biology keywords and expanding to 150 papers

paper_1.title: Quantum Reinforcement Learning with Transformers for the Capacitated Vehicle Routing Problem
paper_1.pattern: hybrid quantum-classical reinforcement learning models for addressing complex combinatorial optimization problems

paper_2.title: Accelerating De Novo Genome Assembly via Quantum-Assisted Graph Optimization
paper_2.pattern: hybrid approach utilizing quantum computing-based optimization for genome assembly

top_5_isomorphisms.why_excellent: Both papers use IDENTICAL approach: hybrid quantum-classical optimization for complex graph/network problems. One applies to logistics (vehicle routing), the other to biology (genome assembly). This is a textbook isomorphism - same mathematical structure, different domains.

structural_similarity.input: Complex graph problem (route network / DNA sequence graph)

top_5_isomorphisms.significance: Shows quantum computing approaches transferring from CS to biology

paper_1.title: Applications of structural equation modeling and mathematical statistics in sales optimization
paper_1.pattern: actionable insights significantly advance sales optimization strategies

paper_2.title: CFRecs: Counterfactual Recommendations on Real Estate User Listing Interactions
paper_2.pattern: novel framework for counterfactual recommendations to optimize user engagement

top_5_isomorphisms.why_excellent: Both use statistical/ML methods to optimize decision-making in economic contexts. Sales optimization vs recommendation optimization.
top_5_isomorphisms.significance: Economic optimization patterns appear in both macro (sales) and micro (recommendations) contexts

paper_1.title: Metastable Transitions and Γ-Convergent Eyring-Kramers Asymptotics
paper_1.pattern: combining variational methods, Γ-convergence, and spectral perturbation theory

paper_2.title: Spectral Theory for Borel PMP Graphs
paper_2.pattern: spectrum is continuous under local-global convergence

top_5_isomorphisms.why_excellent: Both papers use advanced convergence theory to study spectral properties. Physics applies to metastable systems, math to graph structures.
top_5_isomorphisms.significance: Mathematical convergence techniques cross over between physics and pure math

paper_1.title: Shared LoRA Subspaces for Continual Learning
paper_1.pattern: low rank adaptation (LoRA) methods for efficient parameter adaptation

paper_2.title: [Biology paper on neural adaptation]
paper_2.pattern: kNN-convolutional architecture demonstrating biological adaptation mechanisms

top_5_isomorphisms.why_excellent: Both explore adaptation mechanisms - CS in neural network training, biology in neural computation. The structural parallel: efficient adaptation through constrained parameter spaces.

structural_similarity.challenge: Need efficient adaptation in complex systems

top_5_isomorphisms.significance: Machine learning adaptation mirrors biological neural adaptation

paper_1.title: A Minimal Task Reveals Emergent Path Integration and Object-Centric Representations

paper_2.title: [Stats paper on GNNs]
paper_2.pattern: graph neural networks (GNNs) learning from network data with counterfactual analysis

top_5_isomorphisms.why_excellent: Both study how networks learn representations. Biology: neural networks forming cognitive models. Stats: GNNs learning from graph structures. Same information processing paradigm.
top_5_isomorphisms.significance: Network learning principles transcend biological vs artificial neural networks

new_connections: Quantum optimization: CS ↔ Biology (quantum computing crossing domains)
key_insights.false_positives_note: Found 2 duplicate papers (cross-listed in cs and stat on arXiv) with 1.00 similarity

keep_doing: Domain-specific keyword approach is working excellently
Manual quality review catches issues (like duplicates)
Expanding to new domains reveals new isomorphisms
next_steps: Add duplicate detection to prevent cross-listed papers
Consider raising similarity threshold to 0.55+ for higher precision
Explore the 930 additional isomorphism candidates not yet stored
Build web interface to explore connections interactively
